item.description:
Lynne Damianos and Barbara Peacock
Monday June 9, 2008, 6:00?10:00 pm
Lynne Damianos and Barbara Peacock, two powerful businesswomen from the Boston area, will share their honest and upfront ideas and strategies on how they do business in today's tough economy. With two different styles and perspectives, these seasoned pro's get into the nitty gritty of doing business in the Boston market, and beyond.
Topics to be covered include: basic business principles, marketing, creating proposals (step by step),  diversification, and the overall presentation of work, to name a few. There will be plenty of time for Questions and Answers at the end of the evening so come prepared with your questions on how to succeed.

Pre-registration is required for this program. Go here to reg: http://www.cipne.org/...
Cost: CIPNE Members, Free; Guests, $35; Students, $10.
Click here to register (Non-members may pay by PayPal)
Please note: on-line registration closes June 6th.
 
Location:
Hilton Garden Inn
420 Totten Pond Rd.
Waltham, MA 02451
 
Registration; 5:00?6:00pm
Program; 6:00?10:00pm*
*Note: Extended program times

item.name: CIPNE Event: Thriving not just surviving...
